message: This offer represents a fair split considering the diminishing value of money over time.
Take a chance to increase your share, but be aware that the value of your share will decrease significantly in the next round if we continue.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose a more equitable distribution that might appeal to both of us.
A small share for you, but it's a significant portion of the remaining amount, and it's worth more than it will be in the next round.
